column2: With the conquest of these lands, we have given our people a new homeland. Even if they first had lived apart from the natives an exchange of both cultures in [Root.Capital.GetName] took place now. They no longer call themselves Andals and [melting_pot_province.Culture.GetName] but [melting_pot_culture.GetName].
The people of [Root.GetName] have become [new_culture.Culture.GetName]. They adopted the new culture that was brought by nearby settlers.

Although many dislike change, this new [Root.Culture.GetName] culture does have a certain functionality that cannot be denied. I have therefore prevailed upon a member of my council to adopt this for everyday administrative use.
